Query: select ifnull(sum(quantity * unit_price * vatco.coef),0) as Sales from sales_invoice as si left join sales_invoice_detail as sd on si.id_sales_invoice = sd.id_sales_invoice left join(select app_vat_group.id_vat_group, sum(app_vat.coefficient) + 1 as coef from app_vat_group left join app_vat_group_details on app_vat_group.id_vat_group = app_vat_group_details.id_vat_group left join app_vat on app_vat_group_details.id_vat = app_vat.id_vat group by app_vat_group.id_vat_group) as vatco on sd.id_vat_group = vatco.id_vat_group where si.trans_date between * $StartDate * and * $EndDate *
Caption: Total Sales
